opponent.label: Saki
opponent.description: Saki Nikaidou rode as The Legendary Kamikaze Squad Leader of the Dorami Biker Gang before her life was cut short in 1997. Now she has returned under the alias "Number Two," to take over Saga as the leader of the idol group Franchouchou!

epilogue.hint: Saki's epilogue isn't ready yet. Please enjoy this one.
Win a game versus Saki. For guys who aren't necrophiliacs.
Win a game versus Saki. For gals who aren't necrophiliacs.
Win a game versus Saki. For guys who aren't cowards.
Win a game versus Saki. For gals who aren't cowards.
